string.text:
A compact personal defense weapon designed for high mobility and effectiveness in close-quarters combat. Featuring a lightweight polymer frame, low recoil, and a high rate of fire, it allows for rapid target acquisition and superior control. Its modular design supports various attachments, making it a versatile choice for special forces, law enforcement, and security personnel.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Germany
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Heckler & Koch
